author: Al Jazeera
title: Iran to resume low-risk economic activities amid COVID-19 crisis
description: Iranian President Hassan Rouhani says two-thirds of government employees to return to their offices from April 11.
content:
Iran's President Hassan Rouhani has said "low-risk" economic activities will resume from April 11 amid a global coronavirus pandemic in the worst-affected Middle Eastern country.
"Under the supervision of the health ministry, all those low-risk economic acti… [+2357 chars]
